text: Great food and service. Our family has been customers for more than 14 years.  Warm environment. Everyone makes you feel like family. Reasonably priced and good size portions.
Wendy the server is a charmer. She remembers everyone. Best service ever. Food is okay but cheap enough you can forgive them for lack of flavour or creativity in their combinations.
Excellent food and service! Not too greasy and the roti with curry chicken is one of the best I've tasted.
